title: first_morning_sunlight_winter_season
summary: Photo record of morning sunlight appearing in the farm area.
description: This data unit records the presence of morning sunlight in the farm area at MaMeeFarm. The evidence is a photo capturing sunlight conditions during the morning period.

reference_context.context_note: Nearby environmental reference from duck house temperature and humidity record.
